text: SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION Routes and streets z Improve walking and cycling connections to, from and within the site. These should support permeability and legibility. In particular, improving east-west permeability is a priority, with redevelopment of the estate enabling the establishment of smaller street blocks and a more open and connected set of streets. Development must provide improved public access to the waterfront at the Limehouse Cut Canal.
